source.Select: SELECT EMPLID,NAME CNAME,NAME_AC ENAME,'WHQ' PLANT,EMAIL_ADDR MAIL,DEPTID,Z_DEPTID_PARENT UPPER_DEPT,'B30' EMPL_CATEGORY,case when trim(SUPERVISOR_ID) is null then 'NULL' else SUPERVISOR_ID end SUPERVISOR,SUPV_LVL_ID OFFICER_LEVEL,BADGE_NBR CARDID,'20010101' TDATE,'WHQ' TREASON,COMPANY,DEPT_DESCR DEPTN,'' HDATE,DESCRSHORT,'' REHIRE_DT,'1' ADULT,PHONE FROM PS_Z_EE_WZSERS_VW
source.Update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET CNAME=:CNAME,ENAME=:ENAME,PLANT=:PLANT,MAIL=:MAIL,DEPTID=:DEPTID,UPPER_DEPT=:UPPER_DEPT,EMPL_CATEGORY=:EMPL_CATEGORY, SUPERVISOR=:SUPERVISOR,OFFICER_LEVEL=:OFFICER_LEVEL::NUMERIC,CARDID=:CARDID,TDATE=:TDATE,TREASON=:TREASON,UDATE=CURRENT_DATE,USERID='SYSTEM', COMPANY=:COMPANY,DEPTN=:DEPTN,HDATE=TO_DATE(:HDATE,'yyyymmdd'),DESCRSHORT=:DESCRSHORT,REHIRE_DT=TO_DATE(:REHIRE_DT,'yyyymmdd'), PHONE=:PHONE,ADULT=:ADULT WHERE EMPLID=:EMPLID
source.Check: SELECT EMPLID FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMPLID=:EMPLID
source.System: PS WHQ EMPLOYEE (此同步需在LOT員工主檔同步之前)
